modName: Mounted Combat - Equip and Unequip 1h Sword on back
summary:
Description:

Fixes sword equip and unequip animations for people using 1h swords on back.
descriptionHtml:
Description:

Have you been using a mod that makes you equip your 1H sword on back?

This mod makes you also equip your weapon from your back so you don't magically pull out a magic weapon from your hip in horseback!

I just replaced the 1h equip/unequip on horseback with the 2h version

DON'T WORRY, THERE ARE SOUNDS!! :))

Requirements:
Skyrim updated to 1.9.32.0.8


[youtube]JNQBP_RV7dw[/youtube]
Thanks to sergiobor for the Demo in the Video tab!

Installation:
Extract the file into

C:Program Files (x86)Steamsteamappscommonskyrim for 64 bit Windows

C:Program FilesSteamsteamappscommonskyrim for 32 bit Windows

Uninstallation:

Delete mc_1hm_equip.hkx and mc_1hm_unequip.hkx in Data/meshes/actors/character/animation/horse_rider/patch folder

Credits to:

Bethesda for creating the game and the animation itself.
sergiobor for the demo video!

*You do not need any permission from me if you want to use it as I did not make the animations*
